title: Morgana's tormented soil
body: Tbh Morgana's tormented soil is kinda useless now. It says dealing 22%-33% damage per second. Who is going to stay on her soil for more than 2 secs? please change to what it used to be which is dealing 11%-33% per half sec. Otherwise riot you just making this game worse. so unfair on Morgana main players. She used to be more viable and good at mid lane. I've run some experience, I only done 2/3 damage per game in comparison to I used to play as Morgana. Please consider change her tormented soil back.{{champion:25}}
